delo rathwi ohu wahanaya soyayi.wahanayata wu de gana wiwidha hethu pahadimda, wimarshanathmaka adahasda, bohodena idiripath karathi.eheth thawamath wahanaya soyagatha nohaka.bahutharayakage mathaya wuye kisiweku ho wahanaya sora gannata athayi kiyaya.ee samangama mathuwa aa anek tharkaya wuye etharam awadanamak dara metharam abalan wahanayak soraganna kawdayi kiyaya.kese ho awasana thiranaya wuye wishwa widyala aarakshaka anshayata ha polisiyata me bawa paminili karannataya.dan wade dura diga yana bawa matath dineshtath therum giyeya.mehidi apa dedenata an ayagen wasan kalayuthu karanayak wuye oonama yathurakinrathaya pana ganwiya haki bawaya.eya eli wunothin dinapathama me siddhiya an aya wisinda karanu atha.ese wima apa mithurata menma apatada hisaradayak wiya haka.manda wahanaya hoyanawa harennata wenath katayuththakata apata kalayak ithiri nowanu atha.enisa apa dedena waha idiripath wi paminilla sandaha apa dedena pamanak bhathiya samanga yamata katayuthu kara anek siyallan owunge katayuthu sandaha pitath kara yawimu.siyallanma pitathwu pasu karanaya pahadili kara wahanaya soyadunnada wihiluwa hethuwen mithurage ase athi wu ratha iwath wimata nam tika kalak gatha wiya.pasuwa siyallanma sithuwe bhathiyata amathaka wi wahanaya wenath thaneka nawath wuwa kiyaya.wishwa widyalayen pitawu pasu apa siyallantama sewaya sandaha rate wiwidha sthanayanta wisiri yannata siduwiya.namuth, apa katawath keti charika we purudda nam harune natha.

kiyala.eeta passe thamayilu henata gini thiyanawa kiyanne.me ehema saththunta kiyana kawiyak.uputa gaththathe ‚Äújayasena jayakodi‚Äú shuringe ‚Äúrayigam puththu‚Äú nawakathawen...oon nokiwwayi kiyannepohawune hawune palayalla...hen kote heta handa jameginilanawa man ginilanawa...thalagoyine palayallapuruk halunu nayihaminikamata wadiyado...ane hanika gal landataada hawasama ya ganne...umbaalath umbaalath kumbaiyanekadiyoth dimiyoth jodu karagenaruk aththana yayata palayalla...polon thelisso kudallohen horakana wanduru nambo...umbaala mata nuhurata hitiyathumbaalath umbaalath palayalla...ee kale nam oon ohomalu.dan kale nam ooka dakina manussayata hina yayi.ee wagema ada kale me wage gathi sirith ithuruwela athiyi kiyala mama nam hithanne na.habayi ada kale minissunta sapekshawa ugath kamen adu unath ee minissu gathiguna athin nam apita wada godak pohosath kiyala hithenawa.mokada kiyanawanam kalaye inna sathek gana thiya thamangema wargaye minissuth ballo balallu ganata mahapare mara damana samajayak thiyana warthamane minissunta wada,thamanta wagema kalaye inna satha sipawatath mahapolawa matha jiwath wenna ayithiyak thiyana bawa eda kale minissu hithala thiyenawa...eeka sahathika aththa...apita wagema me mahapolawe jiwathwenna loku kuda hama sathekutama ayithiyak thiyenawa.ee ayithiya uduraganna api katawath ayithiyak naha...ara manussaya gini thiyala thibbe podi panduru yayak.eeth adatath akkara dahas ganan minissu iwak bawak nathiwa kapanawa...gini thiyanawa..habayi eewa nijabim karagaththu saththunta wenade gana kawuruth hithanawada..mama kiyanne issara kale wage saththunta katha kara yanna kiyana eka nemeyi...puluwan tharam api wagema hama sathekma me loke jiwathnenna ooni kiyana eka hithe thiyagena katayuthu karamu kiyala.mokada me mihithalaya apita wagema hama sathekutama ayithiyi...eekayi api hamoma yatath wena sobadahame nithiya.
eyin passe hamba une madu para...
